text: was a Japanese former middle distance runner. He competed in the 1964 Summer Olympics. Morimoto died on 28 February 2021, aged 81.駒大の礎を築いた森本葵氏が死去 64年東京五輪代表、日本記録29年破られず ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Japanese athletes Category:Middle-distance runners Category:Olympians for Japan
title: Mamoru Morimoto
